quotes.quote: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall.
A revolution is not a bed of roses. A revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past.
The Industrial Revolution was another of those extraordinary jumps forward in the story of civilization.
The revolution has always been in the hands of the young. The young always inherit the revolution.
We're still in the first minutes of the first day of the Internet revolution.
A revolution is impossible without a revolutionary situation; furthermore, not every revolutionary situation leads to revolution.
No real social change has ever been brought about without a revolution... revolution is but thought carried into action.
Personal transformation can and does have global effects. As we go, so goes the world, for the world is us. The revolution that will save the world is ultimately a personal one.
The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
Every revolution was first a thought in one man's mind.
Revolution is not something fixed in ideology, nor is it something fashioned to a particular decade. It is a perpetual process embedded in the human spirit.
The seed of revolution is repression.
The revolution that takes place in your head, nobody will ever see that.
Revolution is born as a social entity within the oppressor society.
Revolutions never go backwards.
Every revolution seems impossible at the beginning, and after it happens, it was inevitable.
The most heroic word in all languages is revolution.
A revolution does not last more than fifteen years, the period which coincides with the flourishing of a generation.
The revolution is carried out by means of one's thought, not through one's family background.
The most important of all revolutions, a revolution in sentiments, manners and moral opinions.
The revolution will come from the people and the willingness to work towards something better, to fight for a better living.
The greatest revolution in our generation is that of human beings, who by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
The only way to support a revolution is to make your own.
The excessive increase of anything causes a reaction in the opposite direction.
The worst of revolutions is a restoration.
One revolution is like one cocktail, it just gets you organized for the next.
Revolution is something that actually starts in individual hearts.
Revolution begins with the self, in the self.
The revolution is really easy to do nowadays.
The revolution doesn't always look perfect.
